name: How Do Aliens Escape
description:
How Do Aliens Escape is a spectacular puzzle-adventure game about an interstellar civilization that is on the edge between life and death. 

Starting with a small starship and a brave team, you will be tearing across the empty wastes of space in search of a new home. For each planet on your way, you will need a specific vehicle that is up to you to build.

As the commander of starship troopers, get ready to meet various planets and species as your journey among the stars. Land on and explore the planet by building a unique vehicle. Hurry up, time is running out!

Key Features

  • Explore every shape of the planets. Remember, your mission is to find a habitable one.
  • Manage your team, including recruiting, training, and sending them to new planets exploration. 
  • Take full control over building and setting your vehicle, taking into account the nature of the terrain and the laws of physics. 
  • Upgrade your vehicle using the artifacts you find on your way.
  • Throughout the entire adventure, you will meet various creatures. Whether to share your knowledge and invite them to join your team or conquer them - that is for you to decide.
